org.dom4j.dom
Class DOMNodeHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.dom4j.dom.DOMNodeHelper
public class DOMNodeHelper
extends Object

DOMNodeHelper contains a collection of utility methods for use across Node implementations.

Version:
$Revision: 1.20 $
Author:
James Strachan
